value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|A report just came in. It doesn't
look good...$k$pUnidentified enemies have been
pouring into every world we defend.
Our forces are being overrun!$k$pEven as our foes fall, more arrive
to take their place.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Then it is as we suspected. We must
find and eradicate the nightmares at
their source.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Yes. If we go to Dökkálfheimr and
rescue Dream-King Freyr, things
should all change back to normal!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|All right. Then there's no time
to waste!$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|*sniff* ...The scent of daydreams
floats on the air. Mirabilis must be
close by now.$k$pWhere could she be?$k$p$Sbs3000|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|$Fi500|...H-huh? Wh-what was...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Hm. Did everything around us seem
to grow blurry for you as well? Was
it some sort of illusion, perhaps?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Oh! That is probably Mirabilis taking
a nap somewhere nearby!$k$pBut...where? Hmmm... Let's try
overrrrrr...here!$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_HAPPY_01,0|$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face|Zzz... *smack smack* Mm-mmm...$k$pB-bwahh?!$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Ah, Mirabilis! I found her! ...Oh,
I'm so sorry—did I step on you?$k$p...Hey! Wake up, sleepyhead!
Helloooo... It's me, Peony!$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face|Mmm... Peony...?$k$p*yyyaaawwwnnn*$k$pGood morning...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Good morning! Mirabilis, we have
a favor to ask of you... We came
because we need your help!$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face|...$k$pZzzz...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh no... Mirabilis! Don't go back
to sleep! Wake up, wake up,
wake up.$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face|*yyyaaawwwnnn*$k$pGood morning...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Listen! Nightmares are flooding
into this world. Dream-King Freyr
has been taken.$k$pWe must all go to Dökkálfheimr
to rescue him.$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face|Dream-King Freyr? Taken? Mmm...
That's too bad...$k$p*yyyaaawwwnnn*$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Hey! Wake up! We need you!$k$pWe can only get to Dökkálfheimr
with your help... We need your
daydream, Mirabilis!$k$p$Sbs3000|$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|So, that's your plan, then. In that
case, I will have to stop you.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Y-you!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|Feed, my nightmares.
Feast on their fear.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh no... I-it can't be!$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|Foolish mortals.$k$pYou thought you could escape
death's balance?$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|As long as people dream, they
continue to appear before me...
That is my nightmare...$k$pMy nightmare never ends.$k$p

$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|So, Mirabilis, can you please take
us to Dökkálfheimr?$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face|Umm... It's over that way...$k$pAs the setting sun sinks...at the
point of twilight... You will be very
close to Dökkálfheimr.$k$pFrom there... *smack smack*$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Mirabilis! No sleeping!$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face|Mrrghh... But the mist in this forest
is so nice and cozy... So perfect
for sleeping in...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|There's no time! If we keep fooling
around here, this won't stay a place
of comfort!$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Hmm? B-because the dökkálfar
will attack?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Anger|No. Because I will be forced to
do something...drastic.$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Heyyy... That's scary...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Get it together. It's time to go.$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face|...You, I am scared of... Let's be
on our way then.$k$p$Sbs150|
